# MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgba_2bpp_srgb

**Case**

A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 2bpp for RGBA components with a conversion between sRGB and linear space.

## Declaration

```swift
case pvrtc_rgba_2bpp_srgb
```

## Discussion

The only texture types that support this format include:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureType/type2D]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureType/type2DArray]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTextureType/typeCube]



## Compressed PVRTC pixel formats

- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgb_2bpp**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 2bpp for RGB components.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgb_2bpp_srgb**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 2bpp for RGB components with a conversion between sRGB and linear space.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgb_4bpp**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 4bpp for RGB components.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgb_4bpp_srgb**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 4bpp for RGB components with a conversion between sRGB and linear space.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgba_2bpp**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 2bpp for RGBA components.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgba_4bpp**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 4bpp for RGBA components.
- **MTLPixelFormat.pvrtc_rgba_4bpp_srgb**: A compressed format that uses PVRTC compression and 4bpp for RGBA components with a conversion between sRGB and linear space.
